page.title: 12INDUSTRY
page.content: There is very little industry in Yateley as it is in the commuter belt and the majority of people work outside the area. Land,as it becomes available, is snapped up for private housing. There is a fibre glass factory (manufacturing pipes, boats and horse boxes). A plastics factory makes jacuzzi and baths. There is a printing company and a precision engineering firm.In addition on the edge of the common are three scrap metal companies.Two of these are car breakers, also selling second hand car spares, but a third is a metal re- processing plant (details on another page). Recently the building that handled tractor production has been demolished. Also in the grid are cement and concrete works and a plastic dipping firm (in Sandhurst).
